name: Newburger et al., Appellants, v. Eckerson

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Newburger et al., Appellants, v. Eckerson.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The opinion of the court below presents the facts and the legal principles applicable thereto in a clear, concise and correct manner. The judgment is affirmed on that opinion.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J ohn P. Connelly, for appellants.
Warwick Potter Scott, with Mm Knox Henderson, of Ballard, Spahr, Andrews ■& Ingersoll, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Newburger et al., Appellants, v. Eckerson.
Argued January 9, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaeeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
J ohn P. Connelly, for appellants.
Warwick Potter Scott, with Mm Knox Henderson, of Ballard, Spahr, Andrews ■& Ingersoll, for appellee.
March 25, 1935:
